title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Photos: Before and After 2005 Prescribed Burn
body: Before and After 2005 Prescribed Burn       The area just north of the parking lot was burned in 2005. At first the area looked like a war zone, but within just a few months glorious green appeared. Areas that have recently been burned often look greener than other parts of the park.       Before the burn. NPS photo        March 2005, shortly after the burn. NPS photo        June 2005. NPS photo
